0.0.4.name: connect20/AncPricepercustomer
0.0.4.description: AncPricepercustomer is a Magento extension which allows to give special prices for a customer to one product. In the default magento system it is only possible to give a special price to a group.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
